desc: Order top-quality pet cologne at Gotdog.com and get your furry friends smelling fresh. Our parody line of pet perfume spray includes familiar dog fragrances like Timmy Holedigger and cK-9 to keep odors at bay. Shop our pet scents store and find the right pet cologne to keep your pooch smelling fresh.

layout.text: If your favorite hound smells ruff around the edges, don't terrier yourself up over it. The GotDog.com online pet scents store has everything you need to take your pooch from trashy to flashy thanks to our exclusive line of pet perfume based on iconic designer fragrances.
